derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French torcious, from the stem of torcion 'extortion, violence', from late Latin tortio(n-) (see torsion). The original sense was 'injurious'

means.word_mean: 1. of or pertaining to the nature of a tort;
